type.name: type_census_acs

column.name: header
column.label: Header
column.suffix: Optional list of column names to use

column.name: for_type
column.label: For
column.suffix: This is the main aggregation level. Census.gov API help

column.name: for_value
column.label: For Value
column.suffix:
The FIPS code to search for when you want a single value, e.g. 08.
  • State FIPS listings
  • County FIPS listings
  • Census Tract listings

column.name: in_type1
column.label: In
column.suffix: The geography specification. If you wanted to just look at data in Colorado set this to "state" and the value to "08"

column.name: in_type2
column.label: In #2
column.suffix: This allows you to do a subsequent selection, e.g. set this to "county" and the value to "013" for Boulder County CO

type.name: type_census_age
type.property: Area Population % Male % Female Median age Median age male Median age female % Male under 18 % Female under 18 Median income

type.name: type_census_children
type.property: Area Children under 18 Children under 6 Under 6 living with two parents Under 6 living with one parent Children 6 to 17 6 to 17 living with two parents 6 to 17 living with one parent Median income

type.name: type_census_race
type.wiki:
+section title={{name}} # {{description wikify="true" }} {{group showMenu="true" layoutColumns="2" layoutType="table" showTitle="false" }} {{label id="census.race.label" wikify="true" text=":note Sized by median income. Colored by percentage race from blue (higher) to white (lower)." }} +row +col-md-4 {{display type="map" layoutHere="true" height="400" colorBy="B01001A_001E" title="% White" showTitle="true" sizeBy="B06011_001E" colorBar="blues" }} -col +col-md-4 {{display type="map" layoutHere="true" height="400" colorBy="B01001B_001E" title="% Black or African American" showTitle="true" sizeBy="B06011_001E" colorBar="blues" }} -col +col-md-4 {{display type="map" layoutHere="true" height="400" colorBy="B01001I_001E" title="% Hispanic or Latino" showTitle="true" sizeBy="B06011_001E" colorBar="blues" }} -col -row
+row +col-md-4 {{display type="scatterplot" layoutHere="true" fields="B06011_001E,B01001A_001E" map-display="false" chartHeight="350" }} -col +col-md-4 {{display type="scatterplot" layoutHere="true" fields="B06011_001E,B01001B_001E" map-display="false" chartHeight="350" }} -col +col-md-4 {{display type="scatterplot" layoutHere="true" fields="B06011_001E,B01001I_001E" map-display="false" chartHeight="350" }} -col -row +row +col-md-12 <center> {{display type="table" layoutHere="true" skipFields="latitude,longitude" map-colorBar="blues"}} </center> -col -row -section
type.property: Area Population % White % Black or African American % Hispanic or Latino % Asian Median income

type.name: type_census_poverty
type.property: Area Population % Below poverty level default default Median income

type.name: type_census_nationality
type.property: Area Population default default default % Not a U.S. citizen Median income

type.name: type_census_housing
type.property: Area Total Units % Owner Occupied % Renter Occupied skip % 1 Person Household % 2 Person Household % 3 Person Household default default Median income

type.name: type_census_education
type.property: Area Population default default default default % Associates % Bachelors % Masters % Professional degree % PhD Median income

type.name: type_census_commuting
type.property: Area Population % Workers drove alone % Workers carpooled default % Biked % Walked Median income

type.name: type_urbaninstitute_employment
type.property: skiplines=1 fields=year[type=string label="Year"],month[type=string label="Month"],metronm[type=string],cbsa[type=string],NumEduHealth[label="Edu and Health" chartable=true] ,NumFinance[label="Finance" chartable=true], NumGoodsProd[label="Goods and Production" chartable=true], NumGovt[label="Government" chartable=true], NumInfo[label="Information" chartable=true], NumLeisureHospit[label="Leisure and Hospitality" chartable=true], NumManufact[label="Manufacturing" chartable=true], NumOther[label="Other" chartable=true], NumPrivServProv[label="Private Service Provider" chartable=true], NumProfBusiness[label="Prof. Business" chartable=true], NumRetailTrad[label="Retail and Trade" chartable=true], NumServProv[label="Service Provider" chartable=true], NumTotNonFarm[label="Total Non-Farm" chartable=true], NumTotPriv[label="Total Private" chartable=true], NumTradTranspUtil[label="Trad. Transp. and Util." chartable=true], NumTranspUtil[label="Transp. and Util." chartable=true], NumWholesaleTrad [label="Wholesale and Trade" chartable=true]
